Text: Please could some confirm if the subs are hardcoded for the none english speaking parts. thanks.
maybe he is talking about the 8 minutes cut from the asian version. this might be the uncut one. i would try downloading this and would comment later.

so yea, this is the uncut version, with the srt file included for the chinese part of the film. It's not hardcoded, so you need to hardcode it yourself if u want to watch it on a ps3. I haven't tried whether this one is cinavia protected or not.
